docs.snippet: Many of the 40 men leaving Rio de Janeiro with Olympic boxing medals around their necks in three weeks will have their pick of professional promoters eager to reward them with riches and fame....
docs.lead_paragraph: Many of the 40 men leaving Rio de Janeiro with Olympic boxing medals around their necks in three weeks will have their pick of professional promoters eager to reward them with riches and fame.

headline.main: Olympic Women's Boxing Tournament Could Be Platform to Pros

docs.snippet: There's a "real possibility" a Georgia man jailed on charges he brought a stolen gun and ammunition into a western Pennsylvania movie theater planned to shoot it up, a prosecutor told The Associated Press on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: There's a "real possibility" a Georgia man jailed on charges he brought a stolen gun and ammunition into a western Pennsylvania movie theater planned to shoot it up, a prosecutor told The Associated Press on Thursday.

headline.main: DA: 'Real Possibility' Armed Man in Theater Wanted to Shoot

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton and Theresa May don’t just wear the pants. They wear the skirts and dresses, too....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton and Theresa May don’t just wear the pants. They wear the skirts and dresses, too.
docs.abstract: Wardrobe of Democratic Presidential nominee Hillary Clinton and other female leaders influences how women seeking power positions in business and government dress.

headline.main: The New Age in Power Dressing
